title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: #1-4
description: Take home all 4 Diary of a Wimpy Kid books today! This Diary of a Wimpy Kid set includes these books starring Greg Heffley: Diary of a Wimpy Kid Diary of a Wimpy Kid #2: Rodrick Rules Diary of a Wimpy Kid #3: The Last Straw Diary of a Wimpy Kid #4: Dog Days
author: Jeff Kinney
